Title: Kimi no Iru Basho
Description: ['A music video project by the artist group Chronicle. The visual artist is loundraw, sound creator is Hideya Kojima, and the song is titled ', Kimi no Iru Basho, ' is sung by T.B.A.', ' ', ' ', ' ', " In the distant future a girl was used to recreate a lost city in virtual space. Due to being hospitalized for an incurable disease, Sachi becomes lonely but still falls in love with a boy, Ryou, who goes to school as she watches from her hospital window. She's confused by a tingling new emotion and the lines of reality begin to blur as she subconsciously tries to pull him into the digital world."]
